description: Observation requested by London Legacy Development Corporation for Application for the approval of reserved matters for the development of 373 residential units (Use Class C3), 452sqm retail floorspace (Use Class E (a-c) and Sui Generis), 733sqm employment floorspace (Use Class E (g)(i) and (ii)), a 493sqm nursery (Use Class E (f)) and a 896sqm space for library use (Use Class F.1 (d)) and community use (Use Class F.2 (b)) (all GEA), with associated car parking, hard and soft landscaping, public realm, streetscape and associated works pursuant to conditions LCS0.27 and LCS0.28 of outline planning permission 18/00471/VAR being details of layout, scale, appearance, means of access and landscape.
site_name: Sweetwater Phase 4, Development Parcels 4.5 and 4.6, Planning Delivery Zone 4, Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, London
